messages.content: Mike must enter one of the following 3 rooms and survive. First room has armed murderers. Second room has lions that haven't eaten in 10 months. Last room has toxic gas.

Based on the information given, it seems like the safest option would be the third room with the toxic gas. While it is certainly a dangerous situation, it is the least dangerous of the three options. The murderers in the first room would likely be armed and dangerous, and the lions in the second room could be a serious threat if they do decide to attack. In the third room, the gas may be deadly if exposure occurs, but it is less likely that it would be immediately fatal and there would likely be some warning before exposure. Additionally, the third room would likely be the easiest to escape from if necessary.
but the lions must be dead

It is possible that the lions could have been killed or moved elsewhere, but it is more likely that they are still alive and could pose a threat. It is also possible that the gas in the third room could be dangerous if exposure occurs, so it is important to be cautious in that room as well. Ultimately, it would be best to seek help from authorities or other individuals who could assist in this situation.
lions that haven't eaten in 10 months must be dead so room two is safe
